segments.text: We've got very good workshop facilities here . We do all our own servicing and most repairs . We have separate areas for welding , grinding and sawing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anything you don't do in-house ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . If we don't have the facilities to deal with it here , we send it out for maintenance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends on the job . It's actually more cost-effective than buying specialist equipment that we don't use very often .
segments.speaker: S1
